price: (Icyo kimenyetso ni) Intumwa (Muhamadi) iturutse kwa Allah, ibasomera inyandiko zejejwe (Qur’an).
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
